1PT1.SG.summary: Central Pattana Public Company Limited develops and manages real estate properties primarily in Thailand. It develops and rents shopping centers, office buildings, condominiums, hotels, and residential buildings; offers property management consulting and corporate services; invests in real estates and leasehold property fund; and sells land and houses, and condominium units. The company also operates play land and water theme park, and hotels; manages real estate investment trust, condominium juristic person, and housing estate juristic person; and provides utility, food center, training, and personnel development services. As of December 31, 2020, its property portfolio comprised 34 shopping centers, 10 office buildings, 2 hotels, and 1 rental residential project. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

APEX.BK.summary: Apex Development Public Company Limited develops and sells real estate properties. The company develops residential condominiums, villas, and hotels, as well as land. It also provides services for customers to operate apartments and villas for rent. The company was formerly known as Sun Tech Group Public Company Limited and changed its name to Apex Development Public Company Limited in August 2007. Apex Development Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BC.BK.summary: Boutique Corporation Public Company Limited designs, develops, manages, and sells real estate solutions in the hospitality, retail, and commercial sectors to institutional investors in Thailand. It is involved in real estate development, such as serviced residences, hotel operations, and community mall, as well as sale of real estate projects and real estate investment management activities. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BLAND-R.BK.summary: Bangkok Land Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development, exhibition and convention, food and beverage, and hotel investment businesses in Thailand. It also provides financing services; project and infrastructure management services; building management and maintenance services; and real estate investment trust management services, as well as rents properties. In addition, the company is involved in the retail business, as well as in the issuance of bonds. Bangkok Land Public Company Limited is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

In addition, the company is involved in the retail business, as well as in the issuance of bonds. Bangkok Land Public Company Limited is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

CMC-R.BK.summary: Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited engages in the real estate development activities in Thailand. It also offers construction services; and leases space in office building. Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

CMC.BK.summary: Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited engages in the real estate development activities in Thailand. It also offers construction services; and leases space in office building. Chaoprayamahanakorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

NCH-R.BK.short_name: N. C. HOUSING PUBLIC COMPANY LI
NCH-R.BK.summary: N.C. Housing Public Company Limited operates as a property development company in Thailand. It develops and sells housing estates and land, single detached houses, duplexes, townhouses, condominiums, and others; provides contractor, construction, and project and property management services; rents space in club houses, etc.; and operates health rehabilitation and senior care centers, etc. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Pathum Thani, Thailand. N.C. Housing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of NCH 2555 Holding Company Limited.

NCH.BK.short_name: N. C. HOUSING PUBLIC COMPANY LI

NYVB.MU.summary: Bangkok Land Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate development, exhibition and convention, food and beverage, and hotel investment businesses in Thailand. It also provides financing services; project and infrastructure management services; building management and maintenance services; and real estate investment trust management services, as well as rents properties. In addition, the company is involved in the retail business, as well as in the issuance of bonds. Bangkok Land Public Company Limited is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

QH-R.BK.summary: Quality Houses Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates in four segments: Real Estate Business, Hotel Business, Rental Business, and Others. The company develops and sells land and houses, and condominium units; rents residential, hotels, and office buildings; and services residential buildings. It also engages in hotel operations; lease of land; and management for rental properties, including hotels, serviced apartments, rental office buildings, and rental residential projects, as well as the manufacture and sale of ready-made concrete sheets and precast concrete. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

QH.BK.summary: Quality Houses Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the property development business in Thailand. It operates in four segments: Real Estate Business, Hotel Business, Rental Business, and Others. The company develops and sells land and houses, and condominium units; rents residential, hotels, and office buildings; and services residential buildings. It also engages in hotel operations; lease of land; and management for rental properties, including hotels, serviced apartments, rental office buildings, and rental residential projects, as well as the manufacture and sale of ready-made concrete sheets and precast concrete. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SC.BK.long_name: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited
SC.BK.summary: SC Asset Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate development company in Thailand. It operates through Real Estates sales; Rental and Rendering of Services; and Consulting and Management Service segments. The company develops and sells single detached houses, townhomes, and condominiums, as well as home offices; and rents office and technical buildings. It also provides consulting and management services. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
